short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your SEO workflow with our new toolbar, featuring shortcuts to Google Tools, Sistrix, Ahrefs, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you active in the SEO industry and looking to optimize your daily workflow? Then we have the perfect tool for you - our brand-new SEO toolbar!

With our toolbar, you can manage your daily business easier and faster by using shortcuts to access a wide array of external services. So, you no longer need to switch back and forth between various tabs for hours or laboriously search for the desired tools.

Currently, we have integrated services such as Google Search Console, Google Tools, Google Queries, Sistrix, Copyscape, Siteliner, Ahrefs, and Bing Webmaster Tools for you.

Install it today and simplify your SEO work!

Future updates will include the following URL-based OnPage checks:

Title Tag
Meta Description
Meta Robots
Canonical Tag
Hreflang
Heading Tags
Images + Alt Tags
Links + Anchor Tags (internal/external, uniqueâ€¦)
robots.txt
sitemap.xml
Schema.org
Open Graph
Author / Publisher
